name: Push Ups
description: A basic upper-body exercise that strengthens chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions:
1. Start in a plank position.
2. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.
3. Push back up.
4. Repeat for 10-15 reps.

name: Squats
description: A fundamental lower-body exercise to build strength in legs and glutes.
instructions:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Lower your hips as if sitting in a chair.
3. Keep chest up and knees over toes.
4. Return to standing.
5. Repeat for 12-15 reps.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
description: Isolate and strengthen the biceps using dumbbells.
instructions:
1. Stand with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
2. Curl the dumbbells up to shoulder height.
3. Lower slowly back to start.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.

name: Lunges
description: A lower-body exercise targeting legs and glutes, improving balance.
instructions:
1. Stand upright.
2. Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.
3. Push back to start.
4. Repeat on the other leg.
5. Perform 10-12 reps per leg.

name: Plank
description: A core stabilization exercise to strengthen abs and lower back.
instructions:
1. Start in a forearm plank position.
2. Keep your body straight from head to heels.
3. Hold the position for 30-60 seconds.
4. Repeat for 3 sets.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound upper-body exercise targeting chest and triceps.
instructions:
1. Lie flat on a bench holding a barbell.
2. Lower the barbell to your chest.
3. Press it back up until arms are extended.
4. Repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Deadlift
description: A full-body strength exercise primarily targeting the posterior chain.
instructions:
1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell in front.
2. Hinge at hips and lift the barbell while keeping your back straight.
3. Lower back to start.
4. Repeat for 6-10 reps.

name: Pull Ups
description: An upper-body pulling exercise that strengthens back and biceps.
instructions:
1. Hang from a pull-up bar with palms facing away.
2. Pull your body up until your chin passes the bar.
3. Lower slowly.
4. Repeat for 6-12 reps.

name: Shoulder Press
description: Strengthens shoulders and triceps using dumbbells or barbell.
instructions:
1. Hold dumbbells at shoulder height.
2. Press overhead until arms are fully extended.
3. Lower slowly.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: An abdominal exercise targeting obliques and rectus abdominis.
instructions:
1. Lie on your back, hands behind head.
2. Bring opposite elbow to opposite knee while extending the other leg.
3. Alternate sides for 15-20 reps per side.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine exercise targeting quadriceps and glutes.
instructions:
1. Sit on the leg press machine with feet on the platform.
2. Push the platform away by extending your legs.
3. Slowly return to start.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.

name: Tricep Dips
description: An upper-body exercise targeting triceps and chest.
instructions:
1. Place hands on a bench or parallel bars.
2. Lower your body until elbows are at 90 degrees.
3. Push back up.
4. Repeat for 10-15 reps.

name: Russian Twists
description: A core exercise focusing on obliques and rotational strength.
instructions:
1. Sit on the floor with knees bent and lean back slightly.
2. Twist torso to the left and right, touching the floor beside you.
3. Perform 20-30 twists.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Strengthens back and biceps using a cable machine.
instructions:
1. Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grab the bar with wide grip.
2. Pull the bar down to your chest.
3. Slowly return to start.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A full-body exercise that improves core stability and cardio.
instructions:
1. Start in a plank position.
2. Drive knees alternately toward your chest quickly.
3. Continue for 30-60 seconds.

name: Calf Raises
description: Isolates and strengthens calf muscles.
instructions:
1. Stand upright with feet hip-width apart.
2. Raise heels as high as possible.
3. Lower slowly.
4. Repeat for 15-20 reps.

name: Dumbbell Fly
description: Chest isolation exercise to stretch and strengthen chest muscles.
instructions:
1. Lie on a bench holding dumbbells above chest.
2. Lower arms out to sides in an arc.
3. Bring dumbbells back together.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.

name: Hamstring Curl
description: Targets hamstrings using a machine.
instructions:
1. Lie face down on a hamstring curl machine.
2. Curl your legs toward your glutes.
3. Slowly lower back.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: Targets upper chest and shoulders with dumbbells.
instructions:
1. Lie on an incline bench with dumbbells in hands.
2. Press dumbbells overhead.
3. Lower slowly.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.

name: Side Plank
description: A core exercise targeting obliques and stabilizing muscles.
instructions:
1. Lie on your side, supporting your body with one forearm.
2. Lift hips to keep a straight line.
3. Hold for 20-45 seconds.
4. Repeat on other side.
